characters.name: Miko Yotsuya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 160cm
__Family:__ [Mamoru Yotsuya](https://anilist.co/character/250703/Mamoru-Yotsuya) (Father), [Touko Yotsuya](https://anilist.co/character/199025/Touko-Yotsuya) (Mother), [Kyousuke Yotsuya](https://anilist.co/character/199026/Kyousuke-Yotsuya) (Younger Brother)
__Powers-&-Abilities:__ Very-High-Level Spiritual Awareness

Miko has the ability to see frightening supernatural things that most people can't, but she pretends that she can't see them to avoid conflict. Her Spiritual-Awareness power overpowers her sight, like the reflection in glass is overpowering and you're unable to see what lies beyond it.

She tries to have a stoic exterior when confronted with spirits, but is internally frightened by them. She also cares deeply for her friend [Hana Yurikawa](https://anilist.co/character/139632/Hana-Yurikawa), using her power to protect her in various ways, such as diverting her from certain routes with spirits and bringing her food when she was sick with a form of spiritual drainage. Miko prefers to ignore the spirits and she denies seeing them whenever she is confronted by others for her talents.

(Source: Fandom Wiki)

characters.name: Hana Yurikawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 156cm

[Miko](https://anilist.co/character/139631)'s close friend. She is clueless of the supernatural terrors that afflict her friend, but she does unknowingly attract a lot of them due to her unusual amount of life energy.

characters.name: Yulia Niguredou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 140cm

An aspiring spirit medium who believes she's somewhat special because she has the power to see spirits. However, she doesn't know that she can only see lesser spirits, and misinterprets [Miko](https://anilist.co/character/139631)'s attempts to protect her from the greater dangers she cannot see as acts of malice.

characters.name: Kyousuke Yotsuya
characters.description:
[Miko's](https://anilist.co/character/139631) younger brother.

Kyousuke is a young boy with short black hair. He is very protective of Miko, even going far enough to assume she has a boyfriend to be wary of.

characters.name: Romm Shindou
characters.description:
__Powers-&-Abilities:__ High-Level Spiritual Awareness, Aura Awareness
__Etymology:__ Romm's surname Shindou means "prodigy, wonder child" (神童).

He can see spirits and humans simultaneously, like one's reflection in glass and the scenery behind it.

He sells many items which interact with the far shore. He was given the name "Romm" by his former master, Mitsue Takeda, as part of the tradition of adding a 2nd name to apprentices.

Romm has been seen to be very bold, running a business geared only to those adapted to seeing spirits. Even though many have called him a fraud, Yuria Niguredou believes in his ways and has been roped into buying some of his products. He is also very mischievous, taking amusement in the unpredictable actions made by Miko Yotsuya. He enjoys teasing Mitsue Takeda.

~!Shindou was brought to Mitsue as a child, and she took him in as her apprentice. She trained him in the art of the occult, and he received his stage name, Shindou Romm. Much to Mitsue’s dismay, Romm grew much more powerful than her, and she doubted her ability to teach him. Although she tried to keep him safe, his curiosity got the better of him and caused him to wander into very dangerous places, such as into the hands of the Bell Ghost.!~

characters.name: Mamoru Yotsuya
characters.description: Father of Miko and Kyousuke. ~!Already deceased.!~
